name: Thyme (Dried)
benefits: Thyme contains thymol and other compounds with antimicrobial and antioxidant properties. It's particularly effective in mushroom-based dishes and adds depth to soups and salads. Thyme has been traditionally used to support respiratory health and contains anti-inflammatory compounds.
amount: 1/2 to 1 1/2 teaspoons dried per recipe, or as part of daily herb servings
